verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> when he entered <S%G1525><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum <S%G2584><s%> after <S%G1223><s%> some days <S%G2250><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> it was noised <S%G191><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%>.

And2532, 2112 many <S%G4183><s%> were gathered together <S%G4863><s%>, so that <S%G5620><s%> there was no longer <S%G5562><s%> room <S%G3371><s%> for them <S%G3366><s%>, no, not even about <S%G4314><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he spake <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> they come <S%G2064><s%>, bringing <S%G5342><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a man sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>, borne <S%G142><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> four <S%G5064><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when they could <S%G1410><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> come nigh unto <S%G4331><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the crowd <S%G3793><s%>, they uncovered <S%G648><s%> the roof <S%G4721><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when they had broken <S%G1846><s%> it up <S%G1846><s%>, they let down <S%G5465><s%> the bed <S%G2895><s%> whereon <S%G3739><s%> the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%> lay <S%G2621><s%>.

And <S%G1492><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> their <S%G846><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>, Son <S%G5043><s%>, thy <S%G4675><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> are <S%G1161><s%> forgiven <S%G863><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> reasoning <S%G1260><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>,

Why <S%G5101><s%> doth <S%G2980><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man thus <S%G3779><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%>? he blasphemeth <S%G988><s%>: who <S%G5101><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> but <S%G3361><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>, even God <S%G2316><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, perceiving <S%G1921><s%> in <S%G4151><s%> his <S%G846><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G1260><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> reasoned <S%G1260><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, saith <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> reason ye <S%G1260><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>?

Which <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> easier <S%G2123><s%>, to say <S%G2036><s%> to the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>, Thy sins <S%G266><s%> are forgiven <S%G863><s%>; <S%G4671><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to say <S%G2036><s%>, Arise <S%G1453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bed <S%G2895><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> (he saith <S%G3004><s%> to the sick of the palsy <S%G3885><s%>),

I say <S%G3004><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, Arise <S%G1453><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bed <S%G2895><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he arose <S%G1453><s%>, and straightway <S%G2112><s%> took up <S%G142><s%> the bed <S%G2895><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> went forth <S%G1831><s%> before <S%G1726><s%> them all <S%G3956><s%>; insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> they were all <S%G3956><s%> amazed <S%G1839><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, We <S%G1492><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it on this fashion <S%G3754><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he went forth <S%G1831><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the sea side <S%G2281><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> resorted <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he taught <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as he passed by <S%G3855><s%>, he saw <S%G1492><s%> Levi <S%G3018><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> son of Alphaeus <S%G256><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the place of toll <S%G5058><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G190><s%> arose and <S%G450><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G1722><s%> sitting at meat <S%G2621><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3614><s%>, and many <S%G4183><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%> sat <S%G4873><s%> down <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G4873><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> many <S%G4183><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> of <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, when they saw <S%G1492><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> was eating <S%G2068><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the sinners <S%G268><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%>, said <S%G3004><s%> unto <S%G3101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, How is it <S%G5101><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he eateth <S%G2068><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drinketh <S%G4095><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>?

And when <S%G191><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it <S%G3004><s%>, he saith unto them <S%G846><s%>, They that are whole <S%G2480><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of a physician <S%G2395><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> they that are <S%G2192><s%> sick <S%G2560><s%>: I came <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to call <S%G2564><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%>, but235, 1519, 3341 sinners <S%G268><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%>'s disciples <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were fasting <S%G3522><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they come <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> do John <S%G2491><s%>'s disciples <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Can <S%G1410><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of the bridechamber <S%G3567><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%>, while <S%G3739><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>? as long as <S%G3745><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G1438><s%>, they <S%G1410><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> fast <S%G3522><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> will come <S%G2064><s%>, when <S%G3752><s%> the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> shall be taken away <S%G522><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> will they fast <S%G3522><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.

No man3762, 2532 seweth <S%G1976><s%> a piece <S%G1915><s%> of undressed <S%G46><s%> cloth <S%G4470><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> an <S%G2440><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> garment <S%G2440><s%>: else <S%G1487><s%> that which should fill it up <S%G4138><s%> taketh from <S%G846><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, the new from the old <S%G3820><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a worse <S%G5501><s%> rent <S%G4978><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> putteth <S%G906><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> wine-skins <S%G779><s%>; else <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3631><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> will burst <S%G4486><s%> the skins <S%G779><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> perisheth <S%G1632><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the skins <S%G779><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> they put <S%G992><s%> new <S%G3501><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> fresh <S%G2537><s%> wine-skins <S%G779><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that <S%G3899><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was going <S%G3899><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath day <S%G4521><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the grainfields <S%G4702><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> began <S%G756><s%>, as they went <S%G3598><s%>, to pluck <S%G5089><s%> the ears <S%G4719><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G1492><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> do they <S%G4160><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath day <S%G4521><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Did <S%G4160><s%> ye <S%G314><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> read <S%G314><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> did <S%G4160><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was hungry <S%G846><s%>, he, and <S%G2532><s%> they that were <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?

How <S%G4459><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> when Abiathar <S%G8><s%> was high priest <S%G749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ate <S%G5315><s%> the showbread <S%G4286><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> it is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> save for the priests <S%G2409><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to them that were <S%G5607><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, The sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, and not <S%G3756><s%> man <S%G444><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%>:
so <S%G5620><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> lord <S%G2962><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of the sabbath <S%G4521><s%>.
